oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Street Scene, Church Street at Seventh Avenue North
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this ca. 1955 shot, Chandler's Shoes occupied the northwest corner of the Bennie Dillon Building located on Church Street. Pedestrians fill the intersection as traffic signals bring all vehicles to a four-way stop. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chandler's Shoes; Bennie Dillon Building
Capital City; Architecture; Buildings; Business
Nashville (Tenn.); Church Street
